isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Description copied from class: Animation
An animation is running when it has not yet reached its final state. This function should not alter the state of the animation and should return fast.

Specified by:
isRunning in class Animation
Returns:
true, if this Animation is running.
See Also:
Animation.step()

paint

public void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
Description copied from class: Component
Paint is called by the container of the component to allow it to draw itself on Graphics g The drawable area on g is (0,0,width,height).

Specified by:
paint in class Animation
Parameters:
g - the area on witch the component will draw it self.

step

public boolean step()
Description copied from class: Animation
Causes this animation to move to its next frame. This method should return as fast as possible.

Specified by:
step in class Animation
Returns:
true, if the animation needs to be re-drawn on the screen. false otherwise.

stop

public void stop()
Description copied from class: Animation
Moves the animation to its last state. Subsequent calls to getCurrentFrame() should return the final frame of the animation.

Specified by:
stop in class Animation
